summary: Program will hide windows cursor while game is active.
descriptionHtml:
This is a workaround to the double cursor issue.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36125/?]Double Cursor Fix[/url] apparently didn't work for all users based on the comments there.


There is another way to fix this problem. Please read the guide here: [url=https://nirklars.wordpress.com/tag/focus/]https://nirklars.wordpress.com/tag/focus/.[/url]

[size=2]
PS I didn't create this. Just sharing.[/size]
author: nirklars
